publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5740 Des McNulty: Retention of Continuing Care Beds at the St Margaret of Scotland Hospice—That the Parliament welcomes Labour health spokesperson Jackie Baillie’s commitment to the retention of continuing care beds at the St Margaret of Scotland Hospice and calls on the Cabinet Secretary for Health and Wellbeing, Nicola Sturgeon, to overrule the decision by NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde to withdraw funding from these beds by 2013.

S3M-5740 Retention of Continuing Care Beds at the St Margaret of Scotland Hospice (lodged on 10 February 2010) Cathy Jamieson*, Trish Godman*, David Whitton*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mary Mulligan*, Bill Butler*, Jackie Baillie*, Dr Richard Simpson*
